data.name: ExceptionShieldingElementDescription
data.value: The configuration element that specifies exception shielding features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

data.name: ExceptionShieldingElementDisplayName
data.value: Exception Shielding Element

data.name: ExceptionShieldingElementExceptionPolicyNameDescription
data.value: The name of the Exception Policy to use in the WCF service when sending exception to this policy.

data.name: ExceptionShieldingElementExceptionPolicyNameDisplayName
data.value: Exception Policy Name

data.name: FaultContractDataExceptionMessageResourceNameDescription
data.value: The key in an external resource file for the localized string to use as the message for the Fault Contract exception.

data.name: FaultContractDataExceptionMessageResourceNameDisplayName
data.value: Message Resource Name

data.name: FaultContractDataExceptionMessageResourceTypeDescription
data.value: The type of the external resource file containing the localized string to use as the message for the Fault Contract exception.

data.name: FaultContractDataExceptionMessageResourceTypeDisplayName
data.value: Message Resource Type

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataDescription
data.value: Provides exception shielding for WCF services by allowing the service to execute a policy and return an appropriate fault message.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataDisplayName
data.value: Fault Contract Exception Handler

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataExceptionMessageDescription
data.value: The message for the fault contract exception.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataExceptionMessageDisplayName
data.value: Exception Message

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataFaultContractTypeDescription
data.value: The fully qualified type name of the Fault Contract to use with this handler.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataFaultContractTypeDisplayName
data.value: Fault Contract Type

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataNameDescription
data.value: The name of this Fault Contract Handler.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataNameDisplayName
data.value: Name

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataPropertyMappingsDescription
data.value: Mappings from the properties of the source exception to the properties of the Fault Contract.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataPropertyMappingsDisplayName
data.value: Property Mappings

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataTypeNameDescription
data.value: The fully qualified type name of the Fault Contract Exception Handler.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerDataTypeNameDisplayName
data.value: Type

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerMappingDataDescription
data.value: An individual mapping between a property of the source exception (or a GUID) and a property of the Fault Contract.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerMappingDataDisplayName
data.value: Fault Contract Mapping

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerMappingDataNameDescription
data.value: The name of the Fault Contract Mapping.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerMappingDataNameDisplayName
data.value: Name

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerMappingDataSourceDescription
data.value: The source property of a Fault Contract Mapping.

data.name: FaultContractExceptionHandlerMappingDataSourceDisplayName
data.value: Source
